Author: Brief_Somewhere
Text: I usually check with my hands or by looking down and standing with my legs straight, and adjusting my knees. They always look wide. no matter what. I can't fit my hands around them. It must have been the pants or the way i was standing for her to exclaim such a wild rumor.

Author: Cattynest
Text: Wait you don't obsessively check yourself in the mirror? How did this go unnoticed? I get BDD that makes one see more width, or the kind that makes you think the bones on skin is "normal," but how do you miss a gap? Just curious aha
